card.name: The burning Ocean
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, The burning Ocean deals X to that creature's controller where X is equal to the number of spells cast this turn

card.name: Olma, The Last Necromancer
card.text: Indestructible, Hexproof, Haste Daybound Whenever Olma, The Last Necromancer enters the battlefield or transforms, each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life

card.name: Olma, The Obsessed
card.text: Nightbound Whenever Olma, The Obsessed transforms, sacrifice him unless he has 2 life counters, then remove those counters Whenever a player casts a spell, you gain 2 life and remove a life counter from Olma, The Obsessed Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent loses 2 life and put a life counter on Olma, The Obsessed

card.name: Blemishine, Radiant Knight
card.text: Defender {W}{W}: Blemishine, Radiant Knight loses defender and swaps power and toughness

card.name: Klinton Fullblast
card.text:
As an additional cost to cast Klinton Fullblast, discard a card
when Klinton Fullblast enters the battlefield, he deals X damage to up to three targets where X is the number of cards discarded this turn

card.name: Revilos, Lone Slayer
card.text: Exalted, Protection from Dragons When Revilos, Lone Slayer attacks alone, double his power and toughness When Revilos, Lone Slayeris equipped, gains Indestructible

card.name: Exarch Magnus
Arcane Chaos
card.text: Each player may draw 2, then each opponent that drew must discard 2 cards at random

card.name: Plagiarist
card.text: Flash When Plagiarist enters the battlefield, you may copy target spell or ability

card.name: Plagiarism
card.text: Flash Copy Target ability or spell {3}{W}{U}: Copy Target ability or spell then return up to one target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only once per turn "I just need to change it a bit right?"

card.name: Against The World
card.text: Target creature's base power and toughness become 20/1 and loses and cannot gain indestructible or unblockable Toughness cannot be increased regardless of +1/+1 counters, equipments, enchantments, or until end of turn effects

card.name: Zentreya, The Gecko
card.text: Cannot be countered Haste, Menace {X}{X}{T}: deal X to any target then deal half that damage rounded down to 2 other targets.

card.name: Blemishine's Longsword
card.text: Equipped Creature gets +2/+2, Trample, and Liifelink {W/B}{W/B} Unattach Blemishine's Longsword: put a Blemishine, The Fallen Knight from your hand, library, or graveyard onto the battlefield and attach this card to it Equip 2

card.name: Blemishine's Platemail
Blemishine's Shield
card.text: Equipped creature gets +0/+2, Vigilance, and Hexproof Equip {1}

card.name: Confused Mind
card.text: target player draws 2 cards then discards 1 card and loses 2 life

card.name: Fiery Evocation
card.text: deal 4 damage to any target, then draw 2 or target player gains 4 life

card.name: Klinton's Trickery
card.text:
Prevent opponents from gaining life, if life gain would be prevented this way it deals damage to the player instead
Whenever you discard a card, each opponent gains 2 life

card.name: Klinton's Logic Class
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player draws a card whenever a player draws a card , except for the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, they discard a card

card.name: Reweave
card.text: Counter target spell Each player may draw a card, then each player discards a card

card.name: Invisibility
card.text: Return target creature you control to its owner's hand Draw a card, then each opponent discards a card

card.name: Paranoid Warden
Blemishine, The Fallen Knight
card.text: When Blemishine, The Fallen Knight enters the battlefield or attacks, each player discards a card Boast {W}{B}: Exile Blemishine, The Fallen Knight, then return her to the battlefield under your control

card.name: Varena, Queen of the Arachnids
card.text: When Varena, Queen of the Arachnids enters the battlefield, create X 1/2 Black Green Spider Tokens with deathtouch and reach where X is the number of creatures in each graveyard and on the battlefield. {G}{G}: Varena, Queen of the Arachnids gains "creatures you control get +1/+1" until end of turn {2}{B}{G}: Creatures you control gain Infect until end of turn

card.name: Painting Nothing
card.text: Devoid create a 4/4 colorless Eldrazi Token Scry 2

card.name: Klinton, The Feywild Abomination
card.text: 1: Deal 3 damage to any target, then gain 3 life
